# Linux 下载 Onedrive

for i in *.zip; do 7z x "$i"; done

curl 'https://japaneast1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/zip?cs=fFNQTw'  -H 'authority: japaneast1-mediap.svc.ms'  -H 'cache-control: max-age=0'  -H 'sec-ch-ua: "Google Chrome";v="95", "Chromium";v="95", ";Not A Brand";v="99"'  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0'  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Linux"'  -H 'upgrade-insecure-requests: 1'  -H 'origin: https://omxo-my.sharepoint.com'  -H 'content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded'  -H 'user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/95.0.4638.54 Safari/537.36'  -H 'accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9'  -H 'sec-fetch-site: cross-site'  -H 'sec-fetch-mode: navigate'  -H 'sec-fetch-dest: iframe'  -H 'accept-language: zh-CN,zh-TW;q=0.9,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.7,en;q=0.6,ja;q=0.5'  --data-raw 'zipFileName=D019.%5B%E3%83%94%E3%82%B8%E3%83%A3%5D.zip&guid=623931b7-ec53-473f-bc4c-0e65f5eee749&provider=spo&files=%7B%22items%22%3A%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22D019.%5B%E3%83%94%E3%82%B8%E3%83%A3%5D%22%2C%22size%22%3A0%2C%22docId%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fomxo-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb%214G1xySx9dE-kvQJYBrIVNe0DADh2s-NImkRL_1T3LHlQH7q9-691QLwu4bTVcyKc%2Fitems%2F014MDM4KNUJTW2M3OKEJDKHMJQANOM2Y3V%3Fversion%3DPublished%26access_token%3DeyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..REl3bTJ6OGN2NkNWNGlSMFdEWXdIdFVFNmY3dkdDaTFnRDBjUzU3STNkUT0%22%2C%22isFolder%22%3Atrue%7D%5D%7D&oAuthToken='  --compressed --output temp.zip
